ch0244_00_hop/0101_0701_01_10:
Hey, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! Going out
exploring again today, are you?
ch0244_00_hop/0101_0701_02_10:
That’s the spirit, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
The day your legend begins is near!
ch0244_00_hop/7101_0701_01_10:
You know what would be a good way to make
Pokémon battles even more fun?
ch0244_00_hop/7101_0701_02_10: Change how you throw your Poké Ball!
ch0244_00_hop/7101_0701_03_10:
Throw ’em in a flashy way, and you’ll be leaps
and bounds ahead of your opponents! Go on, give
it a shot!
ch0244_00_hop/7105_0701_01_10:
My big brother is the Champion of Galar. In the
past, I tried really hard to become the sort of
Trainer that would make him proud.
ch0244_00_hop/7105_0701_02_10:
But now, I know the path I really want to take.
Lee is Lee, and I’m me. It’s OK for us to
be different.
ch0244_00_hop/7105_0701_03_10:
I hope you can figure out what path you want
to take, too, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0244_00_hop/1701_0701_01_10: Feeling all right, mate? You can have this!
ch0244_00_hop/1701_0702_01_10:
From my experience as a Trainer and a professor’s
assistant, I can tell it’s something good!
ch0244_00_hop/2501_0701_01_10:
Before, I traveled all over Galar because I wanted
to be the Champion.
ch0244_00_hop/2501_0701_02_10:
That didn’t turn out as planned. But thanks to all
the people I met on my journey, I’ve got a new
dream now!
ch0244_00_hop/2501_0701_03_10:
There isn’t just one path to follow! I hope you’ve
come to understand that yourself!
ch0244_00_hop/2501_0702_01_10:
My dream is to become a Pokémon Professor, but
don’t you assume that means I’ll go easy on you
in battle!
ch0244_00_hop/3001_0701_01_10:
Good morning! Still half asleep?
Come on! It’s time to get this day started!
ch0244_00_hop/3003_0701_01_10:
I wonder what new sync pairs we might see
today. My excitement’s running ahead of me even
faster than a train!
ch0244_00_hop/3005_0701_01_10:
Wow, how is it already so late? All right, time for
me to let my partner have some hard-earned rest!
